channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- HPE Application Performance Management (APM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- HPE Application Performance Management (APM)

item.title: CVE-2017-14350|2024-09-16T20:51:56.794Z -- micro%20focus -- hpe%20application%20performance%20management%20%28apm%29
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Application Performance Management (BSM) Platform versions 9.26, 9.30, 9.40. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow code execution.
